BasicInfo.short: Yiftee is a simple employee rewards and marketing promotion system designed to delight contacts with thoughtful gifts at local merchants.

Products.name: GiftUp API
Products.description: GiftUp API is a few lines of code that eGift enable any site, app, or platform.

Products.description: Yiftee was added to CrunchBase in 2012
